page.title: 16"The Pheasant":an Inn Page 1
page.content: Mr Bean, his wife, daughter and son -in-law Mr Guy own and manage{'The {Pheasant'}Inn at Withybrook.They bought the place in{1982}with the money they got from selling their houses and from Mr and Mrs Bean's redundancy money. He had worked at {Alfred Herbert's}the{Coventry} toolmakers She had worked at{Jaguar's} in {Coventry. Mr Guy is a trained Chef and developed the restaurant.Today they serve over{1000}meals each week with a record{462}meals in a day.The Inn has a kitchen, a restaurant a lounge and a cellar. The building is about 100 years old,but has been extensively altered.It has 4 chefs,4 barmaids,and 6 waitresses.Altogether 35 people work ,either fulltime or parttime.The head chef is a local man ,previously unemployed, but trained by Mr Guy.
